Description:
Oozing class & style
Oozing class & style, this sleek & stylish brand new home is ready and waiting for you! Situated in the new and upcoming Bloom Estate, this stunning home will make you the envy of family and friends.
Featuring:
4 bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite
Spacious open plan kitchen/living area
Designer kitchen with plenty of bench and cupboard space
2 separate living zones
Close proximity to The Avenue Shopping Village, Hillcrest Christian College and the Monash Freeway, this home should be at the top of your list. Call Lin on 0403 228 198 for further information.

Titled Land 336m2
This 336m2 approximately, titled land is ready to be built on.
Featuring a 10.5 m frontage and 32 m length, ready for you to build your dream home.
Located in the fast growing St Germain Estate in the booming suburb of Clyde North. With close proximity to all local amenities, public transport, parks and school, this land provides for a perfect choice.
Call us today to secure this fantastic opportunity.

Description:
Modern, Stylish Brand New Home in Bloom Estate
ONLY Estate Agents Cranbourne proudly presents this brand new ready to move in house in the sought after Bloom Estate in Clyde North appealing to first home buyers , investors and downsizers.
The very clever floor plan and layout of this property has made sure this home has everything to offer your family.
Downstairs there is an absolutely stunning kitchen and meal area central to the property for all of your family to enjoy. The kitchen has quality stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and ample storage. This light filled kitchen/dining/living leads outside to a fantastic low maintenance outdoor entertaining space and landscaped back yard. Downstairs also boasts a great sized separate living area filled with an abundance of natural lighting ,laundry with stone bench and a powder room .
Upstairs there are four bedrooms , master with full ensuite and walk-in robes .The other three bedrooms with built in robe and share the main bathroom. This home really does have a lot to offer.
Other features;
- Ducted Heating
- Evaporative Cooling
- Double car garage with remote access
- LED downlights
- Fully fenced and landscaped
- Roller blinds
- 900mm cooktop, rangehood and oven
- Reconstituted 20mm stone benchtops
- Soft close drawers and cupboards
- High ceiling
- $10,000 FHOG applicable
Located in the prestigious Bloom Estate you will be in prime position for Schools, Public Transport, Shops and all other amenities. Be quick to enquire not to miss this opportunity.
ONLY one thing left to do...

Description:
DREAMS DO COME TRUE
CLYDE NORTH: In search of a place to call "Home Sweet Home"? Your search ends here. Welcome to No.44, Barley Crescent, Clyde North, located in the most sort after estate in the area, the prestigious Circa Estate.
This impressive, less than two and half years young Glenvill home, is the perfect opportunity for anyone who is thinking of building, but wants to avoid the pain of waiting for years. Neatly positioned on a 390m2 low maintenance block, this is bound to impress first home buyers, families, and downsizers.
The spacious and light filled kitchen/living/dining area situated in the heart of the home. Kitchen is fitted with 600mm appliances with a walk-in pantry and loads of bench space and storage. Sliding doors open to an alfresco, great for a summer BBQ. Living area presents ample space for any family to entertain and relax.
A comfortable and cosy Master bedroom with walk in robe and en suite will surely stand to impress. The welcoming separate formal lounge/Living is perfect for "me" time.
Added internal and external features;
* Approx. 22.64 squares
* Two separate living areas (Formal lounge & Open plan family)
* Upgraded facade
* Gas ducted heating
* Split system air conditioner
* Down-lights
* 600mm four burner gas cook top with range-hood
* 600mm oven
* Dishwasher
* Walk in pantry
* Fully landscaped gardens
* Outdoor living area with alfresco
* Internal access from garage
* Double garage with remotes
- Beaconsfield and Berwick train stations approximately 8 and 10 minutes drive away respectively
- 24/7 medical centre less than 10 minutes away
- Casey Hospital and St John of God Berwick located 10 minutes away
- Monash freeway entrance just 10 minutes away
- Hillcrest and Rivercrest Christian Colleges (2 minutes), St Catherine's Primary School, St Francis Xavier College and Berwick Chase Primary School (5 minutes), Hailybury College and St Margaret's College (12minutes) all within close proximity to the house
- Federation University, Chisholm Institute and Nossal High Schools all within 7kms radius
- Eden Rise shopping centre approx 6 minutes, Casey Central shopping centre 9 minutes and Westfield Fountain Gate 11 minutes away
**PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS**
**Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans**

Description:
BLINK AND ITS GONE
DISPLAY HOME ON SALE (30 Sq Approx)
Serenely positioned, this single level display home delivers outstanding quality. Featuring four beautifully designed bedrooms, two ensuite/three bathrooms, study area three separate living zones, tiled alfresco fitted with BBQ, manicured gardens and double garage this place is adorned with prestigious fittings and is one not to be missed!
As you enter you are welcomed to a formal lounge room, followed by master
bedroom with double doors and a dedicated study area along the corridor. Open plan meals/family area adjacent the kitchen adorned with 80 mm stone benches, 900mm under bench oven, gas cooktop and rangehood, dishwasher, stone splash back, butler kitchen with mosaic tiles and a walk in pantry.
Four bedrooms on offer including 2 master with luxurious en-suite with glass dual basins, Matt black tapware with rose gold touch and walk in robes display sheer luxury. Remaining bedrooms are located in their own separate wing and share access to the central bathroom. Indoor/outdoor living is seamless with heavy duty commercial grade stacker doors leading out to the tiled alfresco entertaining area, ceiling fan, down lights, BBQ and outdoor kitchen with granite benchtop.
Other luxurious features including Italian wallpaper to front living, master bedroom and entry Niches, custom designed clearlite sectional double garage door with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, separate laundry, powder room and low maintenance tropical planted landscaped garden.
Located in Meridian estate, this home is conveniently positioned near a host of amenities including parks and playgrounds, childcare, primary and secondary schools, community facilities and restaurants, sporting ovals and reserves, short distance train station and retail services including Westfield Fountain Gate Shopping Centre and Casey Fields Shopping centre.
Photo ID required at Open For Inpections
NOTE: Link for Due Diligence Checklist
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Why build
The owner says SELL! This brand new 18sq approx home located in the St Germain estate is the ideal purchase for a first home buyer or investor who is looking at skipping the headache of the building process. This modern and stylish SBG built home includes:
- Four spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, the master bedroom having its own walk in robe and ensuite.
- A spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances throughout with stone benches and great storage space.
- Refrigerated cooling and ducted heating
- A remote single lock up garage with internal access.
- Fully landscaped both at the front and back
- A spacious open plan with family/meal zones
With the property being located so close to some of the best private and public schools including, Hillcrest Christian College, Berwick Chase Primary School and RIvercrest Christian College, and with needed amentites at your doorstep please contact Victor from Obrien Real Estate to organise an inspection!

Description:
Brand New home in the heart of Clyde North
St Germain Estate, designed to be the center of Clyde North with retail shops, medical centers, Office space, and a large retirement village, we have the perfect first home or an investment located walking distance from all the above
This three-bedroom home comes with Master bedroom with walking robes and ensuite, three more spacious bedrooms with wardrobes, spacious and modern kitchen with caesarstone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel cooktop & oven, dishwasher, ample storage spaces, open plan meals and living space with heating and sliding door to a cozy and easy to maintain backyard
For your convenience, this home comes with remote control panel lift garage door, ducted heating, blinds, flyscreens, downlights, driveway, letterbox, and many more conveniences
Construction going to start soon.
Pictures are for illustration purposes only.

Description:
Henley built in Highgrove
Located in the popular Highgrove Estate and offering you convenient modern family living this Henley built home will be sure to impress. Situated on a 519 m2 allotment and just meters away from fantastic park facilities this property would be perfect for the growing family or even the savvy investor. Features include:
- 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite & walk in robe
- 2 separate living zones
- Quality kitchen with stone tops & walk in Pantry
- Partially enclosed entertaining area & landscaped gardens
Extra features include ducted heating, split system cooling, double lock up garage with internal access, garage currently used as studio so would suit working from home. As one of the fastest developing suburbs in Melbourne this home offers its new owners a world of opportunity. Don't miss out and inspect today!

Description:
Serenity in Selandra Rise
Nestled in a fantastic pocket in the popular Selandra Rise Estate, this pristine four bedroom home offers generous living space as well as a convenient lifestyle. Featuring a functional layout coupled with neutral tones throughout there is literally nothing for you to do but move in and enjoy the low maintenance landscaped gardens and contemporary design.
Features include:
- Large light filled Master bedroom with a walk in robe and its own ensuite featuring a stone vanity and oversized 1500 x 900 shower plus a further three generously sized bedrooms all including built in robes
- The beautiful kitchen showcases a large stone island waterfall bench which is perfectly complimented by Ilve stainless steel appliances including a five burner 900mm gas cooktop and oven plus a dishwasher, built-in microwave and walk-in pantry
- Luxurious open plan living area including dining and family space in addition to a separate lounge/retreat perfect for those fun family movie nights
- Outdoor paved alfresco area simply perfect to relax with a glass of wine and entertain guests
- Double remote garage with internal access to the home as well as pedestrian access to the rear yard
- Other features include: Ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout, 8ft ceilings, solar gas boosted hot water, quality colour bond fencing and ultra low maintenance gardens
Conveniently located in Clyde North close to parklands and bus services, easy access to schools such as St. Peter's Secondary College, approx 2min walk to Wilandra Primary School and just a 10 minute walk to Selandra Rise Shopping Centre with 24/7 Gym. The perfect choice for those looking for an easy, low maintenance lifestyle!

Description:
Just Move in!
This two-year young home, on a low maintenance block in the highly sought-after Berwick Waters Estate is now on offer. Attractive street presence is established with a modern faÃ§ade and neat gardens - drawing you into your new home. The open plan living being the focal point - comprises of hostess kitchen with 900mm stainless steel appliances and ample bench and cupboard space, open to a sizeable dining and living area. The master bedroom features WIR, as well as private ensuite, while the three remaining bedrooms are serviced by BIR and main bathroom. Bypass the stress of building with this quality built, near new abode. Immaculately presented with nothing to do but move in!
The living area flows to the entertainers decked alfresco, with vergola, ideal for year-round hosting. Boasting pleasant greenery and some yard for your furry companion.
Comforts include; ducted heating, 2 x split system, and internal access from the single lock up garage.
Prime position, a just a short walk to the lake and walking tracks. With close proximity to Eden Rise, Casey Central, Berwick Village, distinguished schools, freeway access, public transport as well as sport and medical facilities.
Call today to make this your home tomorrow.

Description:
WHEN ONLY THE BEST WILL DO!
A brilliant combination of space, light and attention to detail dominates this state-of-the-art executive residence. Bathed in an abundance of natural light from expansive windows and constructed with a commitment to quality, luxurious appointments and cutting-edge design which has resulted in a spacious flowing interior with high/vaulted ceilings enhanced by a desirable location amongst some of top display homes.
The essence of stylish, low maintenance living is on show in this superbly appointed residence, step inside and discover a world of warmth and charm as timber flooring and neutral tones leading to the formal and informal living areas sliding glass doors open from here to an undercover alfresco zone, allowing a seamless melding of indoor/outdoor living spaces.
The chefs kitchen is the centre attraction featuring a butler's pantry with recessed sink, SMEG double-oven and marble-topped benches, all overlooking separate dining and an expansive lounge showered in class with feature vaulted ceilings and an imposing wooden-panelled feature wall
Additional accommodation includes four bedrooms, all with built robes, main with sparkling ensuites, his/hers WIRs. Comprehensive appointments include 5kw solar system worth 20k, LED and mood lighting, 600mm integrated SMEG dishwasher, Braemar reverse cycle heating and cooling, ample storage, remote double garage with internal access.
Offering a sought-after and convenient lifestyle - this chic home is situated moments from the schools, shopping centres, popular sporting facilities, public transport and Freeway access.
SETTLEMENT IN 60/90/120 DAYS

Description:
ABSOLUTE LAKESIDE LIVING ON 615m2 ALLOTMENT.
Located in the much sought-after Meridian Estate, with a land size of approximately 615sqm, this magnificent parcel of land is situated directly across from the lake, encapsulating breathtaking views.
Imagine this 615m2 Titled Block land in a master planned neighbourhood created with genuine community in mind, a blend of stylish display homes and tree-lined streets. Your life here will revolve around local wetlands, vast open spaces, shady parks brim full of places to play, picnic, stroll, exercise and meet up while enjoying panoramic views all woven together with cycling and pedestrian paths.
Ready to construct the home of your dreams in this ideal position; close to schools, Eden Rise Shopping Centre & easy access to M1 freeway. With many parks, playgrounds, BBQ facilities and picnic areas within the estate, it makes the perfect surrounding for kids to actively explore and play. You'll need to be quick to ensure you don't miss out on this opportunity!

Perfectly located and ready to move in
Perfectly located in the Meridian Estate is this well designed new family home. The home features a large modern kitchen with walk in pantry that overlooks the tiled family/meals area with a sliding door leading to the outdoor entertaining area.
All 4 bedrooms are generous in size and feature built in robes whilst the master has a full ensuite and a walk in robe. A remote control garage has direct entry into the home. Built as a turn key property, this home comes ready to move into and is complete with all floor coverings, roller blinds to the windows, fly wire screens, fences, driveway, TV antenna, letterbox and more. Ideal for the owner occupier or the astute investor. Call Lin Zhang on 0403 187 808 for further details.

Description:
Sleek & stylish gem
If you are looking for a young home that is immaculate and in a fantastic location then this is the one for you. A well thought out and open floor plan makes this stylish gem an ideal first home, investment or downsizers dream.
- Spacious feature kitchen with walk in pantry
- Ducted Heating / Air Conditioning & Ceiling Fans
- Decked entertainment space with low maintenance landscaped gardens
Adding to the desirable lifestyle on offer is the convenient location, being situated within walking distance proximity to Pasadena & Selandra Rise Shopping Village, multiple schooling, medical centre, public transport, Casey Race & Casey Fields Sporting Grounds and major road arterials.

Description:
Must see, must SELL!!!
Always wanted that mansion lifestyle but without the maintenance of the huge grounds that normally come with properties like this? Then inspecting 8 Buckskin Drive has to come first on your list. If there were ever a physical description of extravagant, this would be it!
Greeted by a grand double door entrance leading straight into a big formal lounge leading into an even larger family room equipped with intercom and kitchen with gas top cooking, built-in dishwasher and a sea of bench and cupboard space, the first thing that'll strike the eye when you walk in is the grand staircase with is endowed with a beautiful ornamental chandelier and glass railing. The humongous master bedroom located downstairs comes equipped with a luxurious ensuite accessible through a walk-in robe big enough for the shoe collection, dresses and suits with room to spare.
Upstairs you'll find a wealth of bedrooms, all with BIR's along with three bathrooms equipped with jetstream bathtubs to indulge in at your leisure and even more cupboard space than you could imagine. The specially designed music room along with the kids retreat upstairs make for the ideal nook where the kids can practice their musical skills or hang out and play to their heart's content. Ducted heating/cooling throughout the home provide a pleasant temperature in every season, rain or shine.
The outdoors entertaining area, like the home itself is outfitted with every possible luxury you could possibly need to host legendary BBQ's and dinner parties, with two gas ovens, gas BBQ and gas cooktop to keep your sauces nice and warm. Dip your toes in the pool, equipped with waterfall feature, adjacent to the entertaining area to cool off after a day of hard work or watch the kids play while enjoying a cold one on a warm summer's eve.
Come take a look at this magnificent opportunity to secure a luxurious lifestyle property close to shops, parks and amenities all within a stones throw of major hubs such as Cranbourne, Berwick and Narre Warren.
Don't be the one to miss out as the home HAS to be sold! Contact Metin Aziret for more details or to organise an inspection.
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.

Description:
Massive Price Drop !!
Situated in Selandra rise Estate (named Victoria's best master-planned development in the prestigious 2016 UDIA Awards for Excellence) Includes multiple parks, wetlands and walking distance to Selandra Rise Shopping centre (Woolworths, Jets Gym, Medical Centre, AMCAL pharmacy, restaurants) and Selandra Rise primary school and many more.
A top tier home in a top tier estate, the open floor plan itself offers 3 spacious bedrooms, the large scaled master complete with walk in robes and a full en-suite.
Sitting on impressive land size of 508 sqm, this stunning house has all of the creature comforts one would desire. Showcasing 3 bedrooms, Master with Walk-in Robe & private ensuite , two more spacious bedroom with wardrobe with classy main bathroom, an open plan family dining area.
Extra Inclusions
- Ducted heating
- Cooling
- Pergola
- Dishwasher
- Double remote garage
Don't miss this once in a while opportunity therefore you must call " Praveen on 0451 419 996 " now to inspect what this beauty of a home has to offer you.

Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Photo ID is a must.

Description:
Magnificent Design on approx. 587 SQM
Walk into Quality and Luxury with this over 30 square elegant family home. Situated on approximately 587 SQM in the sough-after Deleray Estate of Clyde North, within close proximity to all that this exclusive estate has to offer.
This masterpiece combines spectacular space, with unparalleled quality. Boasting a very large open floor plan and consisting of 4 spacious bedrooms plus an open study (which could be converted into a 5th bedroom, the choice is yours).
Compromising of an extra-large floorboarded master featuring a walk-in robe, as well as a double door built-in robe and a full ensuite, all secondary bedrooms also with BIR and TV points to all bedrooms.
One of the many significant design aspects this home has to offer is an open plan kitchen designed to please the fussiest of buyers, featuring a walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel appliances, feature tiled splash back, island stone bench, pendant drop lights, and loads of cupboard space.
Offering two open living zones, which comprises of a HUGE (over 13 meters long) family and dining area which adjoins to another seating/ formal lounge, all fitted with surround sound.
Outdoor lovers know the struggle is real in finding a spacious block in the ever growing area of Clyde North, there is no longer a need to struggle this home boasts an amazing covered outdoor alfresco area the feature a built in natural gas BBQ, a sink, a built in fridge, surround sound speakers, out door heater and even a fire pit to warm you up in the cooler climate of Melbourne.
Other quality features include a natural gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 6 security cameras around the house, block out blinds, surround sound speakers throughout, a double garage plus a carport that is approximately 9.6 meters in length and 2.9 meters in width, double doors from the carport open to a work shop that is approximately 4.3 meters in length and 2.9 meters in width and MUCH MUCH MORE!
Local amenities include;
- Club Delaray
- Casey Fields
- Clyde Primary School
- Selandra Rise Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne East Secondary College
Call Shabana today on 0411 216 186 or Khalil on 0421 711 125 to make your private viewing of this stunning family home!
